name: IMKStateSetting
desc: The IMKStateSetting protocol defines methods for setting or accessing values that indicate the state of an input method.

items.name: func recognizedEvents(Any!) -> Int
items.desc: Returns an unsigned integer that contains a union of event masks

items.name: func modes(Any!) -> [AnyHashable : Any]!
items.desc: Returns the modes dictionary associated with the input method.

items.name: func value(forTag: Int, client: Any!) -> Any!
items.desc: Returns a value object whose key is the provided tag.

items.name: func setValue(Any!, forTag: Int, client: Any!)
items.desc: Set the value for the provided key.
